name: DIY Dairy
description: A Tiktok video has gone viral, outlining the method to create your own milk using ingredients found in the common household.
effect: All production increased by 25%

name: Scientifically Accurate Cows
description: The average cow produces approximately 24 litres of milk a day. That's far more than the game's base rate :^)
effect: Cows produce 0.0002778 litres/s or 277.8 microlitres/s

name: Rental Agreement Contract
description: Milk is used instead of rental agreement contracts. Cows are 25% cheaper.
effect: Cows are 25% cheaper.

name: High Lactation Cows
description: During high lactation periods, high-yielding cows can produce upwards of 60 litres per day! Supercharge your cows, allowing them to constantly produce this much.
effect: Cows produce 0.000694 litres/s or 694.445 microliters/s

name: Turing Cows
description: Do not fret, and do not be confused. Turing Cows combine the technology of Bluetooth Udders and the research of Milkologists to create cows which are more computationally powerful than Turing machines. James would be proud.
effect: Triple the production rate of cows.

name: Delicious Dairy
description: Milkologists discover an all new formula, producing tastier and more nutricious milk.
effect: All milk production increased by 50%

name: Automoobiles
description: Replace all petrol based vehicles with milk based vehicles.
effect: All milk production is doubled

name: Milk Mobiler
description: Supply contracted Milk Burglars with a Milk Moobile to help them get around faster.
effect: Double the production rate of Milk Burglars.

name: Incentives
description: Incentives.
effect: Incentivised Production.

name: Lactose no more
description: The branch of research under milkology has discovered the cure to lactose intolerance! The value of milk skyrockets!
effect: All milk production is tripled

name: Employment Contract
description: Milk is used instead of employment contracts. Milk burglars and Milkologists are 25% cheaper.
effect: Milk burglars and Milkologists are 25% cheaper.

name: Milk Volcano
description: A new method allows volcanos to combust milk into the atmosphere.

name: Milk Smart Contracts
description: The power of milk is leveraged via the use of BLOCKCHAIN.
effect: Technology based upgrades are 25% cheaper - Bluetooth Udders, Atmospheric milk generator, Milk photosynthesizer, and Particle accelerator
preconditions: Own at least 1 Atmospheric Milk Generator

name: Fire Faster
description: Fire Faster.
effect: Double the production rate of Particle Accelerators.

name: Really Long Tubes
description: Connect our atmosphere with milk Exoplanets to siphon liquid out. These tubes are 9.461e+17m long.
effect: Double the production rate of Exoplanets.

name: Really Really Long Tubes
description: Much longer tubes (3.311e+18m) to siphon liquid from further planets.
effect: Double the production rate of Exoplanets.

name: Milk Prophecy
description: A thunder rumbles the air. His arrival is imminent.

name: MILKyway Galaxy
description: A milk God has deemed it necessary that the entire Milkyway Galaxy shall now be turned to milk. No life remains.
effect: Milkyway Galaxies produce 50% more milk

name: Glasses
description: Allows Max to see further, allowing him to convert more matter into milk.
effect: Double the production rate of Max.

name: Night Vision Goggles
description: Allows Max to see at all hours of the night. His nights will no longer require sleep.
effect: Double the production rate of Max.

name: Telescopic Glasses
description: Allows Max to look into space and milkify the matter at astronomical distances.
effect: Double the production rate of Max.

name: Divine Dairy
description: The milk Gods have bestowed upon society a brand new update, allowing the tongues of humans to unlock the full milk tasting potential.
effect: All milk production is tripled
